data.chText: 报复；报仇
data.enText: something that you do in order to make sb suffer because they have made you suffer

data.chText: 他发誓要报复他的政敌。
data.enText: He swore to take (his) revenge on his political enemies.

data.chText: 丈夫遭到谋杀，她在寻找机会报仇。
data.enText: She is seeking revenge for the murder of her husband.

data.chText: 爆炸事件是对暗杀行为的报复。
data.enText: The bombing was in revenge for the assassination.

data.chText: 报复行动
data.enText: an act of revenge

data.chText: 报复性的进攻 / 杀戮
data.enText: revenge attacks/killings

data.chText: （曾经失败一方的）雪耻，打败对手
data.enText: the defeat of a person or team that defeated you in a previous game

data.chText: 球队想要为这个赛季早先的失败雪耻。
data.enText: The team wanted to get revenge for their defeat earlier in the season.
revenge yourself on sb
be revenged on sb

data.chText: 报复；向（某人）报仇
data.enText: to punish or hurt sb because they have made you suffer

data.chText: 她发誓一定要报复他们所有的人。
data.enText: She vowed to be revenged on them all.

data.chText: avenge为动词，revenge通常作名词。
data.enText: Avenge is a verb; revenge is (usually) a noun.

data.chText: 报某事之仇用avenge something，向某人报仇用avenge oneself on somebody：
data.enText: People avenge something or avenge themselves on somebody.

data.chText: 她发誓要为哥哥之死报仇。
data.enText: She vowed to avenge her brother’s death.

data.chText: 他后来向杀害他妻子的人报了仇。
data.enText: He later avenged himself on his wife’s killers.

data.chText: 报复某人用take revenge on。
data.enText: You take revenge on a person.

data.chText: 在较正式或文学用语中，revenge亦可作动词。revenge oneself on somebody或be revenged on somebody意思相同，均表示向某人报仇：
data.enText: In more formal or literary English, revenge can also be a verb. People revenge themselves on somebody or are revenged on them (with the same meaning).

data.chText: 他后来向杀害他妻子的人报了仇。
data.enText: He was later revenged on his wife’s killers.

data.chText: 不能说revenge something：
data.enText: You cannot revenge something.
She vowed to revenge her brother’s death.

simple_means.memory_skill: re 回 + venge 惩罚，引申为“报仇” → 返回来惩罚 → 报仇

means: (曾经失败一方的)雪耻，打败对手

ex.chText: 他为报复他的妻子杀死了自己的孩子。
ex.enText: He killed his kids to revenge himself on his wife.

ex.chText: 王子后来向杀害他父王的凶手报了仇。
ex.enText: The prince was later revenged on his father's killer.

synonyms.bx: 指惩罚伤害过自己或他人的人。

tips.tip: 可以说 revenge oneself on sb 或 be revenged on sb，但不能说 revenge sth。

ex.chText: 他要为死去的姐姐报仇。
ex.enText: He wanted to avenge his sister's death.

ex.chText: 她从未想过报复有外遇的丈夫。
ex.enText: She never thought to avenge herself on her husband who had had an affair.

synonyms.bx: 多指出于正义的动机，报某事之仇用 avenge sth，向某人报仇用 avenge oneself on sb。

data.enText: revenge yourself on sb
be revenged on sb

data.chText: 报复；向（某人）报仇
data.enText: to punish or hurt sb because they have made you suffer

data.chText: 她发誓一定要报复他们所有的人。
data.enText: She vowed to be revenged on them all.

tr: action taken in return for an injury or offense
take revenge for a perceived wrong
example: He wants to avenge the murder of his brother

value.def: Revenge involves hurting or punishing someone who has hurt or harmed you.

example.ex: The attackers were said to be taking revenge on the 14-year-old, claiming he was a school bully...
example.tran: 据说，这些攻击者是在报复这个14岁的孩子，说他是学校的小霸王。

example.ex: The killings were said to have been in revenge for the murder of her lover.
example.tran: 据说，她杀人是为了替她被害的情人报仇。

value.def: If you revenge yourself on someone who has hurt you, you hurt them in return.

example.ex: The Sunday Mercury accused her of trying to revenge herself on her former lover...
example.tran: 《星期日信使报》指责她企图报复她以前的情人。

example.ex: ...the relatives of murdered villagers wanting to revenge the dead.
example.tran: 想要为死者报仇的被害村民的亲属

trans: 向…报复；获得雪耻的机会（常指在体育比赛、棋赛、玩牌中获得捞本的机会）
向某人报仇[亦作revenge oneself on someone]

rootsaffixes.indicate: = to punish 惩罚 , 引申为“报仇”
rootsaffixes.title: venge

partsOfSpeech.dec: a 加强 + venge 惩罚，引申为“报仇” → 报仇
aveng〔e〕报仇 + er 表名词 → 报仇者
re 回 + venge 惩罚，引申为“报仇” → 返回来惩罚 → 报仇
venge 惩罚，引申为“报仇” + ance 表状态 → 报仇
venge 惩罚，引申为“报仇” + ful …的 → 充满报仇心的 → 复仇心重的
